item.description:
No other sport is so intrinsically linked to nature. Some call it a spiritual experience, most call it indescribable. And yet, in becoming the multi-billion dollar industry it is today, a great paradox has risen. Surfers are indeed directly connected to the earth’s pulse and yet a majority of the materials used are environmentally toxic...

Learn more about the film and buy tickets at:

http://manufacturingstoke.com

It doesn't look like tickets are up for sale yet, but I talked with the person running it, and tickets will be available soon, so keep checking. Also, I am uncertain of the time of the showing on Sunday - perhaps that will become available when the tickets go on sale.

Your RSVP here does not guarantee entrance. You MUST purchase a ticket online to get in to the film. There will be limited tickets available, so make sure and purchase yours early.
item.name: Manufacturing Stoke: a surf film
